instruction: Take a photo of a receipt and save the total to Excel.
If I shake the phone, turn on the flashlight.
When I plug in headphones, open Spotify.
If ambient light is low, enable dark mode.
When I arrive at home, turn off mobile data.
If I get an SMS with 'urgent', vibrate and read it aloud.
When the battery level drops below 15%, enable battery saver.
If I receive a WhatsApp message from Mom, play a custom sound.
When a screenshot is taken, upload it to Google Drive.
When I press both volume buttons, call emergency contact.
